item.title: Cleveland Fedâ€™s Hammack warns of 'challenging time' amid inflation worries
item.description: "On the inflation side right now, I continue to be worried," Cleveland Federal Reserve President Beth Hammack Hammack told CNBC's "Squawk Box Europe."

item.title: President Trump posts cartoon image depicting him firing Fed Chief Powell
item.description: Trump has repeatedly criticized Powell for his cautious approach to cutting interest rates, nicknaming him "Too Late Powell."

item.title: 'Spectacular' AI growth is creating a serious labor market problem for Fed, Jefferies' David Zervos warns
item.description: Long-time market bull David Zervos is worried the Federal Reserve is dangerously ignoring the artificial intelligence boom's fallout.

item.title: Not just for the ultra-wealthy: Two firms team up to create more access to private credit boom
item.description: Simplify Asset Management and VettaFi launched the actively managed Simplify VettaFi Private Credit Strategy ETF (PCR) on Wednesday.

item.title: How gold, bitcoin are moving beyond market hedge and boosting investment income
item.description: Investors want exposure to alternative assets that don't move with stocks and bonds. They also want income. Wall Street and BlackRock have an answer.
